trans-unit.source: Represents an array of <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> objects that dynamically resizes itself as required.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una matrice di oggetti <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> in grado di ridimensionarsi in modo dinamico secondo le esigenze.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> to be added to the end of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> da aggiungere alla fine della classe <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> to the end of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.
trans-unit.target: Aggiunge un oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> alla fine di <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes all elements from the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutti gli elementi da <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> da individuare in <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a specified <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> is in the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica se un oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> specificato è presente nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="item" /> is found in the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="item" /> è presente in <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> to locate in the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> da individuare in <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of a specified <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> in the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce l'indice in base zero della prima occorrenza di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> specificato nell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of <paramref name="item" /> in the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero della prima occorrenza di <paramref name="item" /> in <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />, se presente; in caso contrario è -1.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which to insert <c>item</c>.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero in corrispondenza del quale inserire l'oggetto <c>item</c>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> da inserire.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> into the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserisce un oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> in <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" /> in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> è minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is equal to or greater than the return value of <see cref="M:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentCollectionContract.GetCount" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> è maggiore o uguale al valore restituito di <see cref="M:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentCollectionContract.GetCount" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of a specified <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> from the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove la prima occorrenza di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.RemoteArgument" /> specificato dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the element to remove.
trans-unit.target: Indice in base zero dell'elemento da rimuovere.

trans-unit.source: Removes the element at the specified index of the <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove l'elemento in corrispondenza dell'indice specificato di <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentArrayListContract" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> è minore di zero.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: oppure

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is equal to or greater than the return value of <see cref="M:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentCollectionContract.GetCount" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> è maggiore o uguale al valore restituito di <see cref="M:System.AddIn.Contract.Collections.IRemoteArgumentCollectionContract.GetCount" />.
